snippet: The Huntington Library in California has acquired a set of 17th-century Chinese albums of wood blocks and poetry from the Ten Bamboo workshop.
abstract: Eve M Kahn Antiques column; Huntington Library, Art Collections, and Botanical Gardens acquires set of 17th-century texts and images from China; property near Taos, New Mex, owned by British novelist D H Lawrence, known as Kiowa Ranch, reopens to public after years of being a shuttered health hazard.
lead_paragraph: The Huntington Library in California has acquired a set of 17th-century Chinese albums of wood blocks and poetry from the Ten Bamboo workshop.

headline.main: Delicate Chinese Albums for Wealthy Show-Offs
headline.print_headline: Delicate Chinese Albums for Wealthy Show-Offs

keywords.value: Huntington Library, Art Collections and Botanical Gardens
